archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.6.3c: c) selecting security controls that will satisfy relevant compliance requirements (e.g. those outlined in the Sarbanes-Oxley Act, the EU General Data Protection Regulation 2016/679 (GDPR), PCI DSS, Basel III, data privacy requirements and anti-money laundering requirements)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
